benchmark_details.name: ImplicitA VE (Implicit Attribute Value Extraction)
benchmark_details.overview: ImplicitA VE is the first publicly available multimodal dataset for implicit attribute value extraction, sourced from the MA VE dataset, consisting of 68k training and 1.6k testing data across five domains.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive benchmark for multimodal large language models (MLLMs) on implicit attribute value extraction.

data.source: Sourced from the MA VE dataset and expanded to include implicit A VE.
data.annotation: Validated through two rounds of human inspection.

methodology.calculation: Micro-F1 score calculated between the ground truth answer and the model-generated answer for each attribute.
methodology.interpretation: Higher micro-F1 scores indicate better performance in implicit attribute value extraction tasks.
methodology.validation: Test set annotations validated through human inspection.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: The datasets are sourced from publicly available data.
